title: Do you have the original will and any codicils
question: Do you have the original will and any codicils?
paragraph1:
You must send the original will and any codicils to us, not photocopies, as part of your application.

By law, we need to see the original will and codicils and keep them as they become a public record.

A codicil is a legal document that's a supplement to a will. Codicils list changes and updates to a will and are signed and witnessed the same way as a will.

Check if a codicil is attached to the will, or they may be loose pages. The word ‘codicil’ may be at the top of the page.

original.required: Answer ‘yes’ if you have the original will and any codicils?
